description: This header file defines internal function prototypes for the Slap Sco Gallery object in the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It includes declarations for functions related to state management, collection handling, management, and membership operations within the gallery component.

methods.name: SlapScoGalGetSlapGoaIf
methods.description: Retrieves the SLAJ Goa Interface handle associated with the gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalGetOlmContainer
methods.description: Retrieves the OLM container handle associated with the gallery object.

methods.name: SlapScoGalGetCount
methods.description: Returns the count of items in the gallery.

methods.name: SlapScoGalGetVariable
methods.description: Fetches a variable from the gallery based on the provided parameter list.

methods.name: SlapScoGalSetVariable
methods.description: Sets a variable in the gallery using the provided parameter list.

methods.name: SlapScoGalAddVariable
methods.description: Adds a new variable to the gallery with details specified in the parameter list.

methods.name: SlapScoGalDelVariable
methods.description: Deletes a specific variable from the gallery based on the parameter list.

methods.name: SlapScoGalDelAllVariables
methods.description: Deletes all variables from the gallery.

methods.name: SlapScoGalJoinGallery
methods.description: Adds the specified variable to the gallery, joining it.

methods.name: SlapScoGalQuitGallery
methods.description: Removes the specified variable from the gallery, quitting it.
